summary: CONSUMER HAS HAD TO HAVE BRAKES SERVICED 5X TIMES SINCE MOTORHOME WAS PURCHASED.  THE BRAKES PULSATED AND WARPED EXCESSIVELY WHILE DRIVING.  THE DEALER CONSTANTLY SERVICED THE VEHICLE BUT ADVISED THE CONSUMER THAT THERE WAS NO REMEDY.  THE DEALER ALSO ADVISED THAT MANUFACTURER WAS USING BRAKES NOT EQUIPPED FOR THE VEHICLE'S LOAD.  CONSUMER ADVISED THAT BRAKES ARE "AIR OVER HYDRAULIC".   *NLM
